casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 28, 2010

[Cite as 06/28/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-2911.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-0444. Johnson v. Ward.

In Mandamus. This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of relator’s second renewed motion to vacate the dismissal and reinstate the case.

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
